data.title: The Return of Abhimanyu
data.description: When money goes missing from Major Kathiravan's account, resulting in a personal tragedy, he decides to track down the calculative hacker behind this.

data.title: Baadshaho
data.description: A heist action period film about an Indian queen, who seeks her bodyguard's help to seize the gold, which the government had raided from her palace during the Emergency in 1975.
data.detail: Moderate Sexual references, Moderate Language , Moderate Violence, Some Drug references

data.title: RX100
data.description: Shiva falls in love with Indu, the daughter of a local politician. When circumstances separate the lovers, Shiva discovers that Indu had an ulterior motive, what was it?

data.title: Jaguar
data.description: To avenge his father's death, a young medical student, Krishna takes law into his own hands. On the road to justice, he falls in love with his classmate.

data.title: Dishoom
data.description: Two cops (one; a no-nonsense cop and the other; a rookie) on a 36-hour manhunt for a missing Indian cricketer, who has been kidnapped under mysterious circumstances.

data.title: Taqdeer
data.description: Avinash gets separated from his childhood love Priya. Will fate play its part and bring the two estranged lovers together as grown-ups?

data.title: MCA Middle Class Abbayi
data.description: Young, middle-class boy Nani has to protect his sister-in-law, a transport official from a gangster, who runs an illegal transport business.

data.title: Hate Story 3
data.description: Climbing up the success ladder, Aditya, a businessman makes many enemies. Now, one of them is back to seek revenge.

data.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
data.description: A biopic on Milkha Singh aka 'The Flying Sikh,' the film chronicles his incredible struggle; from being an orphan to becoming one of India’s greatest athletes.

data.title: Sanam Re
data.description: When a much-in-love couple gets separated owing circumstances, the boy's grandfather predicts that the two are destined to be together. Will his prediction come true?

data.title: Black Water
data.description: A normal fishing trip turns into a nightmare for Grace, Adam and Lee when their tour guide is devoured by a crocodile. Alone in the swamps, with no sign of rescue and a croc they have nothing but each other.

data.title: Hero
data.description: A gangster's son kidnaps the daughter of the Chief of Police, as her father has some crucial evidence. While the police chase the two, love blooms between them.
